name: Capital Realty Group River Region LLC
text:
Mike and Barbara,

Just a quick note to THANK YOU For the FANTASTIC & PROFESSIONAL MARKETING SERVICES that you both continually provide to Our REALTORS® at Capital Realty Group River Region!

Our Broker and Owner, Kitty Wasserman, LOVES The Company Agent name tags that were Custom Created Especially For Our Team! -  Every Detail of Our Logo, including the "R" and river "waves" were artfully expressed in an Outstanding manner!

Also important -
is VERY REASONABLE Pricing for the Quality Services that you provide!

Thank You Both Again for your OUTSTANDING SERVICE with a Smile!!!

Sincerely,
John Moseley, REALTOR®
Marketing Director for:
Capital Realty Group River Region, LLC

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kimyarda Jones
text: During the Christmas season on a Friday when the streets are very busy I got off of work early to get a plaque for my in-laws engraved, no one was there.  There was no sign or any indication that no one was in the building except the lights being off. The sign posted on the door and all of the internet signage says they close at 4:30 I arrived at exactly 4. When I call to ask was anyone there I was told, Sorry we had to leave early. I explained my issue with hopes of them offering me a better time to come back or a discount I was told ....again with less compassion than the first time sorry for the inconvenience. I work 9 to 5 Monday through Friday when they are open I had to make special arrangements for that time off. They clearly don't care so I went to Furlongs. They were there. The work is beautiful and was fast.   I was also treated with a discount for this company's grave inconsideration for PAYING customers Edit: I originally gave 2 stars without comment, but after being harrassed for my rating I dropped to one. As a business owner I cannot stress the importance of time management and customer service satisfaction. It is a fine line, but it must be walked.

resp.text: Kimyarda, you came after 4PM on Friday and found us closed. As we explained to you by phone and email, we had to close that day a little early due to something that came up. We were taking food to a family who’s mom had surgery. We hadn’t talked to you and we’re not expecting you or we could have made other arrangements to meet you later or another time after hours. Again we apologize for your inconvenience

name: Summer Kindle
text: Excellent quality and friendly service! Highly recommend!!

name: Theresa Hull
text: Great work and great service on short notice. I would highly recommend this company and will use them in the future!

name: Andrea Forman
text: I needed an engraved gift for boss's day and they were the only shop who was friendly and could get the job done the same day! Great quality and fast,  friendly service!  Highly recommended.

name: A W Brakeley
text: USAF Active Duty.  I needed a Dress Shirt nametag ASAP, after losing it on the way to Maxwell AFB.  I gave this store a call, and within 45 minutes he had a brand new one made up for me, with plenty of time for me to get back to base and attend my fiancee's graduation, looking sharp.  I could not have been luckier to find this place, and the other work inside looked impressively professional.  Thank you for your speed and skill, and if/when I come back through Montgomery, I will definitely be doing business here again.

name: David McCaughtry
text: After a last minute order was dropped in my lap 1st Place Trophy really saved my bacon! Kudos to a top notch business. I will definitely patron them again!

name: Ryan R
text: Excellent service! Quick and friendly couple. Was strapped for time and they were able to meet the short deadline.

name: Mark Williams
text: I picked up some awards and the engraving really popped. I will be back here again. Great service!!

text: After a last minute order was dropped in my lap 1st Place Trophy really saved my bacon! Kudos to a top notch business. I will definitely patron them again!

name: Ryan R
text: Excellent service! Quick and friendly couple. Was strapped for time and they were able to meet the short deadline.

name: Mark Williams
text: I picked up some awards and the engraving really popped. I will be back here again. Great service!!

name: Shawanna Grant
text: Wondering couple and great customer service skills and I feel In love with the banner

name: Jared Garfield
text: Michael Godwin is a true Southern gentleman, who goes above and beyond to meet client expectations.  When I first walked into his store he stayed way after hours to meet my needs.  His recommendations were excellent and innovative, especially his "window perf sign process" that will give me one of the best storefronts in the Historic Prattville downtown.  His prices are excellent, and he was even willing to match national pricing from a big warehouse vendor for my real estate signs!  If you want small town service, big city professionalism and great pricing, Central Alabama Sign & Banner is your place.

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: He has been our sign man for years!  He does superior work!!  Great prices and fast service!! He is very creative and stays  on the cusp of new technologies!  Give Michael a try and you will be very satisfied with his work.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Evita B
text:
Went in to get an outdoor retail sign. Gave my information and was told someone would come out and measure. They never did. I called about 3 weeks later and was told someone would come out that day to measure. Waited at the location all day until about 8pm. No one showed up. I've heard a similar story from another business owner about them never showing up or calling back. Decided to go with SignOps and they were very helpful, and got our sign made and up within a week of contacting them and approving the design. They handled everything and it looks perfect!

Response. "Perceived"? No one came to measure and he admitted he didn't come and measure the first time, citing the holidays. I visited the shop before the holidays and in 3 weeks time, no one measured or contacted me. After I called, he never came that day after saying he would. I was there all day, and no one measured and no one contacted me. I do not have any calls from this place and I gave my cellphone number and address. Place is like 10 to 15 minutes away. As I said, another business has had the same experience. People reading this review can decide for themselves from my "perceived" experience. Thank you and have a nice day.

resp.text: I am very sorry for your perceived experience.  One of our salesmen did go out and measure for your sign. After repeated attempts to contact you with no response on your part, we figured you decided to go another route.  If there is anything we can do for you in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Tiffany Trueblood-Adkins
text: These folks are great to work with! They do a superb job and always help when I'm in rush for time!

name: Alisa B
text: This family owned/run business is awesome.  Always friendly, great customer service.  I have purchased several monogrammed products from Central Alabama Sign and every single one was perfect!

name: Janyth Grimes
text: Would not exchange return damaged merchandise.

resp.text: I'm sorry that we would not be able to return your item.   There was no receipt for return and the item did not leave our store in the condition that you attempted to return it in (Stained with black marks and cut under the arm).  We inspect our clothing items carefully and do not sell unacceptable product.

name: Rachel Stanislas
text: Crown Trophy never disappoints. Great customer service and great products make this my go to for anything trophy related.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words.  We love our customers and do whatever we can to meet their needs.  Thank you again.

name: Michael Hitt
text: Exceptional customer service! Completed a job for me much faster than anticipated. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you.  We appreciate your review.

name: Bobby DeHaye
text: Great people to work  with! Our baseball team won the State Championships and we needed trophies for our players and coaches within a short period of time. Crown Trophy did what they promised and had our trophies completed on time! Thank you!

resp.text: It was our pleasure, and congratulations again to you and your team.

name: Melissa Walker
text: Gus and his staff go above and beyond when it comes to customer service. I wasn't sure of the exact product my government customer needed, but Gus gave me excellent guidance. And the turnaround time was amazing! I needed a major change, and it was taken care of immediately, with no additional cost. Their prices are ridiculously affordable, too. I will definitely use Crown Trophy again and recommend them to anyone needing trophies, plaques, awards, etc!

name: Crystal Alexander
text: I needed trophies on the spur of the moment..the owner graciously and very kindhearted helped me choose and engrave each trophy without any prejudice.   He simply said give me about an hour....and he was true to his words.  AWESOME COMPANY!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Terrie Littrell
text: We were in a bind and Gus came through for us. He knows his trophies and medals!  Will be using them regularly moving forward.  Very happy!

name: Ricardo Rivera
text: Very Professional, responsive and reasonably priced.  They turned around an engraving request in 10 minutes.  They have won over my loyalty.

name: Daniel Shrider
text: Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. And the prices are very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Doug Swafford
text: Best trophy shop around.  Period.

name: Chris Martin
text: Prices very reasonable and jobs completed in a timely manner!!!

name: Nate Wilcox
text: Always helpful and able to make deadlines.

name: Mark Hall
text: Gus helped me pick out the trophies, gave me the total and had them ready when he said he would, thats all a person can ask.

name: michelle clark
text: Great place. My products turn out fantastic, and was done very fast too!

name: Mark Green
text: Lights are on but nobody's home! Can't get jimmy to answer the phone, return calls or emails. I guess this business is either closed or on its way to closing. Where am I going to get my t ball team shirts now?

name: Bridgett Babb
text: Great Store, Great People and Great Quality Items

name: Manuel Valentino
text:
(Translated by Google) quality not good

(Original)
calidad no buen

name: Jody Griffin
text: Great place and better service.

name: Ali M
text: They have done so many order for econotechrecyclers.com that I can't even keep up! They are BEYOND awesome!

name: Michael Pettey
text: They are great people that support all of the area's youth sports programs.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: River City Roofing Solutions
text: Fast service. Excellent work.

name: Jasmin S
text: Amazing work & beyond great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jasmin!!

name: William Lovell
text: good shop

name: Jordan Lovell
text:
Really disappointed in Athens Athletics this year.  They shorted me one Jersey and two hats for youth baseball.  They told me the items would here by opening day.  Long story short, they weren't.  Nobody called, nobody apologized, no explanations were given....  I was told they had ordered me a shirt, but they no longer had the size I needed, so they ordered a different size.  Also, eventually, they told me the hats had never been ordered.

I came today and they refunded me my money that I paid them 2-3 weeks ago.  I still don't have the hats and shirts for everyone :(

resp.text: I apologize that you were not called or apologized too. These hats and jerseys are trademarked and we can’t produce them ourselves because of MLB. When the company is out of stock and tells me they can’t give me a date of when they will be there I chose to get the next size so you would have something for opening day. The hats were ordered originally and shorted from the order so they were reordered. It is not our intention at all for you not to get what you order. If I could print them myself this would not be an issue. Again I apologize for this happening!

name: Michael Muse
text: Great people awesome prices!!!!

name: Bryan Lee
text: Hate to do this, but I feel the lack of professionalism and skill needs to be addressed with this company. I had this company do a sign for one of my retail stores, and the job is still not finished. I was first told 4 to 6 weeks, and it has been over six months and they have still not completed what they continued to promise that they would. I understand the coronavirus played a factor, but this job was supposed to be done before the virus ever hit, and after the virus slowed and they were back to work around May, I was continually told “we are understaffed due to the virus” and “ I will try to get it done this Friday”. I am not sure why the completion of my project continues to be pushed behind others.

resp.text: Brian I covered those holes months ago. Is that what you are referring to?

name: Cindy Wilt
text: So happy with the signs on my pet grooming trailer. The design is awesome, and the service was great! No hidden costs, no delays and it turned out better than I had imagined.

name: Scootie Dabbs
text: I have used Sign Pro for over a decade now for signage needs. They are ALWAYS very helpful, accommodating and easy to work with. In over a decade I have never had a problem with them and their customer service is amazing. I highly recommend them!

name: Tracy Deng
text: Great value, family operation, friendly staff. We have been trying to get the new sign for business for 2 month, only this one could get the job done. 5 Star.

resp.text: Thank you for the business. Come see us again

name: Jennifer McEachern
text: Delivered my sign and it was of wonderful quality! The customer service is awesome and we are so happy with our purchase! We will do business again with them!

name: Chase Matthews
text: I have used Sign Pro for more than 13 years and the staff is always helpful, with all my projects, no matter the timeline or complexity of the project.  Great company!

name: Dionne Williams
text: I totally recommend Sign Pro and Brian for your signage needs. He is a pleasure to work with. Professional and very courteous!

name: Mickey Bott
text: Did an awesome job with the vinyls on the doors of my tow truck

resp.text: Thanks so much.

name: Karen Yates
text: 5 STAR !!! No need to look any further <3   Amazing service, Excellent quality, Excellent people <3 Amazing mgmt.

name: Springhill Medical Center
text:
Always a great job and rush is offered too.
Would be nice to add your phone number to your Google+ page.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business we really appreciate it.. Thanks for the heads up on the pnone number, just added phone number. Hope we can help you again soon.

name: Emily LaBiche
text: Sign Pro does amazing work! I have used them countless times and I am always pleased with their work and their customer service! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Dan Garland
text: Great job thanks!

name: Dan Andouille
text: I've used Sign Pro for years and my company grew to a point that I hired a marketing manager.  She recently ordered signs from an online company instead of Sign Pro and they showed up all wrong.  They also showed up late, which wouldn't matter but they were for an event that was 2 days away.  I called Sign Pro and let them know about the problem and they truly saved the day.  They reprinted the signs and completed the installation for us.  Saved us a lot of embarrassment.  It was a great lesson for my marketing manager to learn - use local trusted guys that have a focus on quality and customer service.

name: Andrew LaBiche
text: Great company to to work with and I plan on doing more business with them in the future. I highly recommend them for all of your sign and graphic needs!!

name: M Rechner
text: Honest, very nice people,  easy to work with.  Can't say enough about the product .. I love my sign !!

name: Jay Friday
text: Sign Pros professionalism and quality is awesome!  I recommend them to anyone.

name: 3 Echoes Productions
text: Brian and his team were professional, attentive and helpful - excellent service and excellent results! The Today's Homeowner TV crew will be traveling in style!

name: Patrick Morton
text: I chose Sign Pro based on a personal recommendation and I'm glad that i did. The signs that i got were better than i expected. I will go back.

name: David Willcox
text: Excellent service, excellent price. I'll be happy to go there again!

name: Michael Mota
text: Awesome work very reliable !

name: Kevin Strickland
text: Left four items to be engraved last Monday, was told end of week. 10 days later stopped by after never receiving a phone call. Two of the items were ruined despite explicit instructions, and the job was never even started. Was never offered a resolution or explanation. Poor communication and very poor business practices, avoid this place.

resp.text:
You are absolutely right. I was not here when you came to pick them up, and Dale wasn't aware I had closed the lock. It was a stupid of me to close a lock which has no key. Even dumber to close 2 out of four. After I did that I e-mailed the company and found out there was no way to open it. I was inquiring about selling their product and replacing yours. I didn't contact you or tell anyone here what had happened. I regret this mistake, and the poor communication with you and the others at our business. I will be more than happy to replace the items or reimburse your cost to replace the items. I am very sorry we didn't live up to the high standards expected of us.
Jerry Bowman

name: Paula Mahalik - Huntsville, Alabama Realtor
text: They are wonderful, creative, professional, skilled and affordable!  I have had three items created by Bowman’s for my clients, each time the end product has exceeded my expectations!  Highly recommended!

name: victor davis
text: I've used Bowmans several times always quality work. These guys can fill all your engraving and rubber stamp needs.

name: Bobby Wallace
text: Great selection of products and very fair on the prices.

name: Mike L
text: Excellent shop. Miss Dale is always on top of her game.

name: Baxter Bax
text: Great for one of a kind engravings .

name: norman mckelvey
text: Ordered signature stamps, was ready next day

resp.text: thanks for the review it really helps , jerry bowman

name: Larry Tooley
text: Very friendly and helpful.

name: Edward Jimenez
text: Great craftmanship.

name: Tyler Griffin
text: Funny ladies! Old school.

name: Trae Otwell
text: Friendly, helpful staff that can care for all of your award needs.

name: Champ Ion
text: WOW! Ryan did an outstanding job. I had a special request to put a text message on a plaque as a gift. Came out exactly as I had hoped! Due to privacy I'm only showing the buttom.

resp.text:
Glad to hear you liked it Champ! We always have a good time making custom plaques like these, so keep em' coming!

- Ryan

name: Sally May A
text: Courteous. Helpful. Reasonable prices.

resp.text:
Glad to hear that you had a good experience with us. We look forward to working with you again!

- Ryan

name: Holly Huffington
text: Can't do basic engraving without crooked letters.

resp.text:
I'm very sorry to hear that you have had a bad experience with our awards. It has always been our policy to re-run any engraving that is unsatisfactory to our customers, and in most cases problems like this can be remedied within a few minutes.

Feel free to bring the piece by our store and we will do our best to make things right!

Ryan Kelosky
Owner - Crown Trophy of Pelham, AL

name: Matt Bein
text: Very knowledgeable and professional place to get awards for any event.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Matt! We look forward to working with you on your next event.

name: Ever Duarte
text: The best place to buy trophies!!!

resp.text:
Thanks for your feedback Ever!
We're glad to hear that you've had good experiences with our awards, and look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Moemurda
text: Real nice and helpful staff. Reasonable prices on ttophies. I didn't receive a call once my order was complete other than that i used them services at least once or twice a year .

name: Brady McLaughlin
text: Birmingham Trophy Company has always delivered excellence in customer service, responsiveness, and quality of plaques / awards that I've ordered.  Very timely as well.  Highly recommend!

name: Angels WeddingCreation
text: Excellent experience with Birmingham trophy shop, carnita and Mike are wonderful. I gave them an order yesterday morning  for 18 plaques different names different sayings and they had them ready for me before 10 a.m. the next business day. I highly recommend Birmingham trophy shop for all of your printing needs regarding plaques, trophies ,awards engraving ,whatever you're needing

name: Roy ORR
text: My team LOVED their trophies. The customer service was EXCELLENT and the price was Great thanks to Carnita!!!

name: Charles Parker
text: The plaque is awesome

name: Lisa Allen
text: I didn't go to Birmingham Trophy for a trophy. I went because I was wondering if they could make a custom piece of  brass door hardware that I couldn't find online to order. The owner created one on the fly right then while I waited and didn't even charge me for it. That kind of customer service is incredibly rare! Thanks so much, you're awesome, the piece you created worked great!

name: Toni Brown
text: Grear customer service is what you will find at BTS. Michael and Carnita are the best.

name: Steve Dellinger
text: Good product variety, great service.

name: Chris Reese
text: Awesome people, a great company that produces high quality work

resp.text: Hey Chris! Thank you for leaving such a nice review! We take pride in our work, and always strive to produce the best work possible.

name: John McClendon
text: Greatest people to work with.  Highest quality signs.  Very reasonable prices.  Highly recommended.

name: Bill Barrett
text: Great product and great price.

name: Mike Gallagher
text: The best people you could do business with. They make and sell about any kind of signage that you need.

name: Teresa marie
text: They do it all in a timely manner with a smile on their faces never had a problem

name: Tow Monster
text: Awesome people!

name: Nicole T. Springer
text: I was blown away by the customer service at Hudson-Poole. We came in to look at engagement rings on a Saturday about 30 minutes from closing, and the staff were incredible. I told them what I liked and my budget and they were able to help us find ones that fit what we wanted. The store is immaculate, and you can tell they truly want each customer to have a great and personalized experience. They were never pushy or looking to push us past our price point at all. Incredibly patient and just a fantastic experience all around. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: WOW!!! Thank you so much, Nicole. It means so much to us that you took the time to share this. Please come back by to see us whenever you are close. We wish you both many blessings! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Andy Love
text:
The reviews here don’t lie.. excellent customer services! My name is Holly . I have visited the store to redesign a band for my diamond ring that I’ve had for a long time but not liking the style too much.
They drawer up a beautiful fancy computer graphics design of the ring base on details I want with measurements of all angle... and even provided me a wax version of the band to try on.. and everything is free of charge.. isn’t that Amazing 💕
But I later have decided of not to go with it because my sister like the original ring and wanted to purchase the ring from me..
I felt bad to have them working so hard for me for nothing so I also purchased a beautiful pair of diamonds and citrine earring before I left the store just to thank you for their service ❤️
Love them ❤️The best in town

resp.text: Holly, you are so sweet to take the time to write this incredible review!!! We love making custom pieces with family stones. That is what makes jewelry so special, the ones that can tell the story of the family and their journey. I am so glad that your sister will be enjoying that ring. Please let us know if we can help in the future. We wish you many blessings!!

name: William Curry
text: John and his staff are exceptional. The customer service at Hudson and Poole is great. When you walk in they greet you with a smile. Ten years ago, I purchased my wife’s engagement ring here because of their wonderful reputation. With help from Krista, I got the perfect ring (All of the 4Cs) for my wife. Thanks a million.

name: Benjamin Brown
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, but the appraiser is incompetent. Don't waste your money getting your jewelry appraised here.

name: Honor Able
text: I went there a year ago to get my sons name engraved on his necklace. They were very welcoming from the moment you walk in to the moment you walk out

name: Jamie lou Purser
text: Very elegant store and friendly stafr

name: Shane Gardner
text: Awesome jewelry and great service and the best book/do it all keeper ever 👍

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: Super helpful people! Always beautiful jewelry!

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words about our wonderful staff. We sincerely appreciate you for the time you took to give us this review!

name: Jeffrey (Jeff) Muratori
text: Great service with a friendly environment! Will definitely be going back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Jeffrey!

name: Ashley “Kav” Kavanagh
text: Incredibly helpful staff! They appraised and cleaned my antique and new jewelry and were very intrigued by a few pieces discussing with me all the details they could tell me. Definitely will be returning for future cleanings and hopefully purchases as well!

resp.text: Ashley, we thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great review and for the five stars! Come by anytime and have a great day.

name: James Waltman
text: Wonderful collection of jewelry and other great gift ideas. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers is the ONLY place i shop for my fine jewelry needs.

name: Junea Childers
text: Traveled 108 miles getting there. Called before I went. Told them I was bringing a 1954 Gibson Mandolin. However when I got there. I was being checked in by a nice counter clerk, when all of the sudden a young man came out and abruptly rushed me out saying "there was no market for instruments". When in their TV ad they had promoted a variety of items they were accepting. Instruments included.

resp.text:
Junea,
I am so sorry that you took your time to come to our store and not get a good answer. This is the first time we have partnered with a buying group that does the variety that they do. I wish the young man had asked me or my father who in town deals in fine instruments. I have a wonderful referral for you, as we have already called one of the owners that would very much like to make an offer on your mandolin. Please contact Dan at the Guitar Gallery. Here is their website:
https://theguitargallery.com

We really hope that this works out, and we will  always be here to help in any of your jewelry needs if you can give us another chance.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice-President

name: Luke Remmert
text: Simply the best jeweler in town. No need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: We really appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review, Luke!

name: Andrew Durham
text: I’m not sure where to start to explain how happy and satisifed I am with Hudson Poole. I walked in and met Heather, and from the second I met her I felt so comfortable and like I knew her. Mrs. Jamie Poole shortly also assisted me. Mrs. Poole was absolutely wonderful. She respected my opinions, she walked me through a step in life that I am new to. Hudson Poole has my business for life. Generally, going into a fine jewelry store is a very overwhelming experience as generally the staff doesn’t open up and welcome. These folks made me feel like family. Thank you Hudson Poole for being so amazing!

resp.text: Jake, thank you so much for this incredible review!! We are extremely proud and humbled that you have chosen us to be your family jeweler, and we work very hard to keep your trust.

name: Happy Lady
text: First I would like to say thank John for doing a fantastic job with my ring. John went above and beyond to work with me. Everyone at Hudson Poole always makes me feel welcome. I will use Hudson Poole forever. The way I can custom do jewelry makes me so excited!

resp.text: WOW! This is an amazing review! Thank you so much!!

name: caroline staggers
text: Always very friendly, professional and helpful. Beautiful selection of jewelry and gifts. Do great repair work.

resp.text: Caroline, Thank you very much for this great review. We really appreciate you coming by to see us!

name: Peony
text: I spent a long time searching for a strong but delicate-looking die-struck (not cast) setting for the stones from my old broken down three-stone ring. Krista and staff helped me find the perfect setting. I drove hours to Tuscaloosa and back several times (past plenty of other jewelry stores) to get the prettiest ring and best customer service. Everyone at Hudson-Poole is responsive and so helpful--in person, by phone, text and email. The long trip was absolutely worth it!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for giving us this wonderful review! We appreciate you trusting us to reset your three stone ring. Please come by anytime for us to clean and check it.

name: Jeremey Newell
text: I had a very special wedding band sized down. I took it home and noticed it didn’t fit as well as I thought. This was a mistake that I personally made. It had nothing to do with the quality of work that Hudson-Poole provides. I went back to Hudson-Poole and asked them to resize again. Not only did they resize, but they did it at no additional costs. They said my satisfaction was their goal. Excellent customer care. They will definitely handle all of my fine jewelry business in the future.

name: Emily DeFrance
text: Their jewelry is exquisite and there are so many beautiful choices. The customer service is excellent and you feel like family when you are there.

resp.text: Emily, thank you for coming to see us and for the excellent review. We will work hard to make sure it stays this way and for anyone you send to us. I am so sorry for the late "thank you". Have a wonderful 4th of July!

name: Vivian Tant
text: Gene and his staff are phenomenal. You immediately feel at home when you walk through the door. Gene and John both did a fantastic job of helping me pick out my wedding band and my future husbands wedding band. They talked me through the whole process, and I left feeling like I knew exactly what I was getting and how important I was to their company. I will forever send anyone looking for jewelry to them! Thankful for such a wonderful company in our community!

resp.text: Vivian, thank you so much for this phenomenal review! We appreciate you letting us be the ones to help you with your wedding bands and we will continue to work hard to keep that trust to be your family jeweler.

name: George Jacob Houghtaling
text: The BEST jewelry store in Alabama!  The BEST customer service in Alabama!  The BEST prices in Alabama!  You get the idea?  I have been doing business here over 12 years and never have been disappointed.  Gene, Jamie, John, Krista and their outstanding staff are true professionals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review, George!!

name: Leanne Phillips Mays
text: I just purchased my garnet and diamond "Roll Tide" ring from out of state. I originally saw this ring on Pinterest several years ago, and have spent many nights stressing that they would discontinue it before I could buy it. Ashley took care of me with the most professional and caring manner. My ring arrived today, and it is worth every penny. Thank you for helping my dream piece of jewelry become a reality.

name: Susie Palmer
text:
Always very friendly staff.  Always.
I brought a box-chain necklace back, which I had bought from there.  It broke as I was cleaning it.
They repaired it on my visit and I walked out with it.
Not too mention, they also helped me a with watch band adjustment (not bought from them). Noncharge.  Simply a complimentary service.
That's why I will wait, until a trip back to Alabama from Oklahoma, just to go by Hidson-Poole.  They always treat me well.
Thank you!  :)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susie. I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to give us this great review. We hope to see you the next time you are back in Tuscaloosa.

name: Kathleen Stein
text: They did a great job fixing my bracelet. Their price for the repair was very affordable and the customer service was great!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you very much, Kathleen!

name: Christien Hawthorne
text: I am absolutely in LOVE with my ring! I ordered it online and the next day received a call from John Poole who is the Vice President of the company. He told me that unfortunately the ring was out of stock but that he had already contacted the designer in New York to have them build a new one which would only take about two weeks. Sure enough, I later received another call from Mr. Poole notifying me that my ring was ready and that he would set up email alerts for the shipping so I could track the package. It arrived in a cute little wrapped box with a big bow and had a business card that was personally signed. Loved the personal touch. Awesome experience -- will definitely recommend to others!

name: HRH METALS
text: Very nice people/helpful/nice large place/probably have what you need or want

name: Barbara Nicosia
text: I left 2 pairs of earrings to be fixed.  When they called & gave me the price, I said just fix one, the other one’s too expensive for its worth.  When I picked them up, Mr. Poole told me they had fixed both of them, & he wasn’t going to charge me for the 2nd pair since it was their mistake.  So nice to find honest, reputable merchants still around!

resp.text: We really appreciate the five star rating and for this wonderful review, Barbara! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Sammy Gray
text: Exceptional service! Very courteous, and everyone went out of their way to help with all our needs. As a first time customer, I've definately found my new primary jeweler for future purchases!

name: Brittany Graham
text:
Hudson-Poole is a fantastic Place to purchase jewelry. Not only do they have an outstanding selection of merchandise that is all very different and can suit anyone’s taste, their customer service is out of this world. I will continue to shop from them, even though I am not a local, because of those two things.

They care about their customers, they have a fantastic selection, and you can tell that they care about you as a person and not just getting business from you. That, to me,  is everything. You can’t go wrong with this place! :-)

name: Kristy H
text: Big thanks to John for taking such great care of all my needs and wants. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for your next piece of jewelry! Thanks again for being so kind and taking care of me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for giving us another chance and for this wonderful review!

name: Hannah George
text: A great jewelry shop with unique merchandise good for anyone's taste! Also, incredible customer service. The workers will spend time with you to suit your needs. When my ring I had bought a month ago began to lose color, Hudson-Poole replaced it without any charge. I cannot speak highly enough on how wonderful this place is!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Hannah! We thank you for coming back to see us to let us get it right.

name: Julia Clark
text: Hudson Poole is full of some of the kindest staff members. I truly feel the people here look out for their customers best interests. A big thank you to John Poole for helping me get the necklace of my dreams in the metal color that I preferred. It's even better than I had envisioned and I cannot thank you enough.

resp.text: We are blown away by your wonderful review, Julia. Thank you so much for your time and thought that you put into it!

name: Camille Robinson
text:
Very few jewelers have all the qualities I need in meeting my expectations for superior quality merchandise, customer service and custom pieces.  Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers makes my “A List”.
I have purchased and had custom pieces made by Hudson-Poole for many years.  In fact, I am working with John Poole now on a new custom ring.  If you are looking for a professional jeweler, visit Hudson-Poole in Tuscaloosa,Alabama.

Camille Ogden Robinson

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great review, Camille!

name: joseph ushe
text: First class, actual people who want to Help you and make sure you are happy! I will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review, Joseph!

name: Natalia Go
text: If I could give a 10 star out of 5, I would! Hudson-Poole saved my wedding day! This is probably the best jewelry store I every walked into. My fiancee and I don't have a big budget for our wedding and we needed something that we could afford. Ashley was there with us every step of the way, making sure that we get the rings we want and that we stay on budget. She is a hero! Plus, they offer services for maintenance and repairs, some for free. I definitely love Hudson-Poole <3 This will be the first place I would go to for any piece of jewelry.

resp.text:
Natalia,
I read your review and was blown away! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great testimonial. I spoke with Ashley and Tanner and we all truly appreciate you both thinking of us for your wedding rings.  We will do all we can to continue to be your family jeweler. The next time you are by the store I would really like to thank you in person, so please ask for me when you do. I wish you many blessings and Godspeed in all of your hopes and dreams together.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice President

name: Connie Harris
text: The girls that helped me were very kind and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Connie, for this five star review!

name: Kaitie Brihn
text: Everyone was very nice and helpful!

resp.text: Katie, thank you so much for stopping by and for this great review!

name: Patterson "Patt" Howard
text: Such a lovely buying experience at Hudson-Poole today. I felt well advised, knowledgeable staff and a very fair price on a lovely set of pearls for our mother. We will shop again with this store.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words, Patt. We hope that we can continue to go above and beyond on our service to remain your family jeweler.

name: Marsha McAllister
text: I would give Hudson Poole more than 5 stars if I could. All the employees are nice and knowledgeable. And the customer service is great. Repairs are timely.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Also,  thank you for thinking of us for your jewelry repair needs.

name: Kayla Fleischer
text: Absolutely stunning! The staff was more than courteous and delightful! They take the time to answer all your questions and really help you find that right piece. In love!

resp.text: Kayla, thank you so much for taking the time to give us this fantastic review! We truly appreciate it. Let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

name: Vicki Baggett
text: I love supporting local family owned businesses and Hudson Poole Fine Jewelers makes this so easy for me. They always treat me like family and go above and beyond to meet my needs. Whether I'm needing a gift, making a big purchase, or only getting a repair done they are always so eager to assist me any way they can.

name: Andrew Todd
text: I came in to have an additional appraisal performed for an engagement ring that I purchased for my girlfriend. They looked at the stone recommended revising the language of the existing appraisal rather than having a second appraisal performed. They extended the highest-quality service to me, even though the recommendation resulted in me not making a purchase today. I will use them for all my jewelry needs in Tuscaloosa!

name: Caroline Shines
text: This is my number 1 place everything is beautiful

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Caroline! You make our day every time we see you!

name: Heather Reeves
text: Rachel is one of the sweetest, genuine people to assist people with jewelry purchases.  Ale is very honest and informed. Her trustworthiness is impressive which will always bring customers back.

name: Willie Aaron
text: I have been doing business with this company for several now and each time it has been a class act. Mr. and Mrs. Poole have been wonderful to deal with. Highly recommended!!

name: Alwyn Protheroe
text:
Yet another shot of excellent service ! ! !
Having dealt with Hudson Pool for several, several years, with John in particular, I can say that not one time have I had ANY cause to complain about the service I have had, they are people who will go out of their way to help you.

resp.text: Alwyn, thank you so much for writing such a fantastic review for our store. We thank you for always thinking of us!

name: Angelique Dean
text: The staff at Hudson-Poole are always so helpful and kind! I get the best service from them whether I'm purchasing jewelry or just getting my ring cleaned!

name: Robert Bulson
text: First class place of business. Very friendly and helpful employees.

resp.text: We are very thankful that you have been shopping with us. Thank you so much for the fantastic review!

name: Rachel Willis
text: Very helpful and friendly employees! Coming to Hudson-Poole is always a pleasant experience!

resp.text: Thank you for this great review, Rachel. We really appreciate you coming to see us!

name: Dana Micael
text: This is the place to go if you need jewelry or any help with current pieces! The staff is incredibly kind and are always welcoming to my husband and I. John Poole is the best at what he does!

resp.text: I cannot thank you enough for this fantastic review, Dana. Thank you both so much for your trust. This made my day! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Tristen Larson
text: Very kind and helpful employees! Went in to get my glasses repaired, they were very efficient.

name: Nikki Little
text: Very helpful picking out my finances wedding band! Thank you Tanner for your time and friendly service!

name: steve stay
text: Knowledgeable, friendly and very experienced people at Hudson-Poole! Go here and you can't go wrong!

resp.text: Thank you for your time and for the great review, Steve!

name: Anne Boyd
text: The staff are incredibly kind, genuine, and very skilled! Thank you for fixing my necklace so well and so quickly!

name: Steven (Trent) Harris
text: Very friendly service and has a good selection of pandora products

resp.text: We really appreciate you coming to us, Trent. Thank you very much for this wonderful review.

name: Danielle C
text: For 24 years as a customer, they never cease to amaze me with their quality service and how they treat everyone like family!

name: Insert Yourname
text: Hudson-Poole is a very nice store with great employees. Everyone we have dealt with has been very friendly.

resp.text: Mark, Thank you for taking the time to give us this great review.

name: David Slowikowski
text: Always such expertise, selection and professionalism at Hudson-Poole!  Hands down, our favorite jeweler.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a wonderful review, David!

name: Laurie Wright
text: Great people and great service!  Trust/integrity/knowledge-exactly what a jeweler should be.

name: Rebecca Fleisig
text: They are so helpful and kind!! The only jeweler I go to in Tuscaloosa or Birmingham. Cannot sing praise high enough!

resp.text: Rebecca, thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great review. We truly appreciate the opportunity you gave us to help you with your jewelry needs.

name: james ray
text: Nice selection of Pandora and higher end jewelry.

name: Anna Katherine Geiger
text: The staff is always very polite and helpful when I call or go to the store!

name: Brenda Randall
text: Hudson Poole, under the expert leadership of Gene Poole, has always been very kind and gracious in donating beautiful door prizes for community fundraiser events, in particular the Women's Chamber and Homebuilders. Their gift is always the most sought after item!  Aside from being generous, they also have a very accomodating and considerate staff and a great display of jewelry and gift items.  Thanks so much for doing what you do for everyone in the Tuscaloosa area!

name: Brett Jenkins
text: Amazing selection. Knowledgeable and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review!

name: David Martin
text: Very helpful employees here. Nice jewelry.

name: Paul Smith
text: Super nice people.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review, Paul!

name: Callie Rhodes Outlaw
text: Trusted source for jewelry repair, friendly service, great selection, locally owned. I always go here first!

name: Michael Calup Snider
text: Tanner took all the pain and hesitancy over selecting a ring out of the process.  Highly recommend.

name: Megan Walsh
text: Hudson Poole always provides excellent service! They are my family's go-to place for gifts and jewelry.

name: Joe Gosa
text: Courteous and trustworthy.

resp.text: Joe, thank you so much for this 5 star review and for the kind words about our great staff. Please come by anytime.

name: Keith Bradley
text: Everyone is always extremely profesaional and courteous.

name: Scott Shepherd
text: Always friendly! Great selection!

name: Connie Grechanik
text: My favorite jeweler!!

resp.text: We truly appreciate this 5 star review and the kind words!!

name: Adam Sealy
text: Great place to do business!!!!

resp.text: Adam, we really appreciate you taking the time to give us a wonderful review.

name: Monica Culmer
text: Customers  service number

name: Patricia Pritchett
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you very much Patricia for this 5 star review!

name: Ca Skinner
text: These folks are THE BEST!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the five star review!

name: Stephaine Buffaloe
text: Beautiful items, locally owned by great staff!

name: La ne
text: Great prices and service

name: Debbie Cierocke
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to see us and for this wonderful review, Debbie! We wish you many blessings in 2019. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

name: Cheryl Lynn
text: Good

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Cheryl!

name: Andrew Kuhl
text: Had a wonderful experience

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review, Andrew. We will do our best to make sure that it is a five star visit every time.

name: Lakeisha Shepherd
text: The Best Jewerly

resp.text: Lakeisha, thank you so much for coming to see us and for the wonderful review!

name: Ben Carithers
text: Really friendly people & helpful!!!

resp.text: Ben, thank you so much for the wonderful review! Please let us know if we can help with anything. Have a wonderful weekend.

name: Alaca Averette
text: Excellent customer service!!!!!!!  Very pleased with the personal service I experienced!!!!!  I will be sure to use them in the future!!!

name: Ryne Chandler
text: This is the best jewelry store in Tuscaloosa.

name: Cory Stevens
text: Wonderful staff. Honest, personal, friendly, and helpful.

name: Trudy Maynard
text: Great service. Wonderful staff. Highly recommend for your professional and even personal needs. Stop in for personalized gifts for family and friends. They will not disappoint!

resp.text: Thank you, Trudy for your positive feedback. I'm so glad you have been pleased with our services and we look forward to helping you with future engravings!

name: Bill Creamer
text: Awesome job on memorial plate for my mother. Very nice lady took care of me. Quality and price perfect.

resp.text: Bill, thank you so much for your positive review! We are so glad you were satisfied with your purchase. Let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Rhonda Sandlin
text: Love this place - they'll know who you are and the shop has a family feel. Great prices - perfect work!

resp.text: Rhonda, thank you so much for your 5 star review! We appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Tony Guthrie
text: Great service! Reasonable prices.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. I'm glad we could help you with your stamping needs. If you need anything further, please give us a call.

name: Melissa Escamilla
text: I was referred to them by our city clerk's office! It is a super chic sweet shop with lots of memorable quotes. Their staff is polite & prompt. They have been in business since before I was born. Local small business with longevity. Definitely worth the stop!

resp.text:
Thank you for the five star review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit at our shop and look forward to helping you with all of your rubber stamp needs.  All of our signs with the quotes that you referenced are custom made and we are constantly adding to our
showroom inventory,  so come by soon to see our new items!

name: Aaron Thomas
text: These folks are AMAZING! I had a rushed order and they were patient and acomidating. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Thomas for the 5 star review.  We appreciate the fact that you would recommend our company to others as well. We are glad to hear that you liked your deskplates and that we could make them as fast as you needed them. If you need anything else, please just give us a call.

name: Jeremy Owen
text: Great place, friendly and straight to business. Tried to have a specific stamp made for my co. and 3 other places couldn't get the alignment rite. These guys got it on the first go! Thank you all very much.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and review! We are glad that you were satisfied with your stamp and the alignment worked for you.   We value your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your business and value your opinions.

name: Emily Rogers
text: Wonderful and friendly service. Did a quick turn around project for me and they rocked it!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star rating on our business! We are glad to be able to help and love to hear from our satisfied customers. We appreciate your business!

name: Maria Presson
text: Prompt to service and calling me to let me know it was ready

resp.text: Thank you for our 5 star review. We appreciate your business and look forward to doing business with you in the future as well.

name: Shakira Grimes
text: Nice place got my order done fast!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are glad we were able to help you out. We appreciate your business!

name: Brian Nothnagle
text: Excellent customer service and quality engraving!

name: Hamid Baraty
text: Friendly staff, good work
